Spring Onion Crop.Description: Adds a crop for spring onions.

Ginger Crop.Description: Adds a late-game crop for ginger.

Sweet Pea Crop.Description: Adds a crop for sweet pea flowers.

Crocus Crop.Description: Adds a crop for crocus flowers.

Common Mushroom Planter.Description: Adds a 'bush' crop for common mushrooms (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Morel Planter.Description: Adds a 'bush' crop for morels (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Chanterelle Planter.Description: Adds a 'bush' crop for chanterelles (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Salmonberry Bush.Description: Adds a bush crop for salmonberries (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Blackberry Bush.Description: Adds a bush crop for blackberries (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Holly Bush.Description: Adds a bush crop for holly (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Coffee Bush.Description: Turns coffee beans from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed). Requires restarting the game to change.

Blueberry Bush.Description: Turns blueberries from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed). Requires restarting the game to change.

Cactus Bush.Description: Turns cactus fruit from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed). Requires restarting the game to change.

Hops Bush.Description: Turns hops from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed). Visually still looks like a trellis. Requires restarting the game to change.

Grapes Bush.Description: Turns grapes from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed). Visually still looks like a trellis. Requires restarting the game to change.

Hazelnut Tree.Description: Adds a tree sapling for hazelnuts.

Coconut Tree.Description: Adds a tropical tree sapling for coconut.
